channel.title: vim on Yury Fedorov
channel.description: Recent content in vim on Yury Fedorov

item.title: Vim: you are holding it wrong
item.description: I have a friend who happens to be a huge fan of Apple products. He also hates Vim. He has quite a few stories about how awful Vim is, and how many problems it causes. A few weeks ago he texted me about a weird problem he had with editing a file on a remote server using Vim.
